name: iShares MSCI USA Min Vol Factor ETF
description: The iShares MSCI USA Min Vol Factor ETF (USMV) aims to provide investors with exposure to U.S. stocks that exhibit lower volatility characteristics. Launched in 2011, USMV is designed to minimize risk while capturing the returns of the U.S. equity market. The ETF primarily invests in large and mid-cap stocks that have historically demonstrated lower price fluctuations compared to the broader market. This strategy is grounded in the belief that investing in less volatile stocks can lead to better risk-adjusted returns over time. USMV includes a diversified portfolio of companies across various sectors, providing investors with a balanced exposure to the U.S. economy. The fund is managed by BlackRock, one of the largest asset management firms in the world, ensuring professional management and oversight. USMV is particularly appealing to conservative investors seeking to reduce portfolio volatility and is often used as a core holding or a complement to more aggressive equity strategies. With a focus on quality and risk management, USMV aligns with the investment goals of those looking to weather market fluctuations while still participating in potential equity upside.

products: iShares MSCI USA Min Vol Factor ETF (USMV)
